MODAL_DESCRIPTION.text: Will you stay at your new address for more than six months? Then you have to report the move to the Swedish Tax Agency.
Get it done quickly and easily here at Flyttsmart, and you will have one less thing to think about.
Compare estimated electricity prices for your new home and sign a contract in two minutes.
Also, do not forget to cancel your current contract - double billing makes no one happy.
See all available broadband options at our new address and pick one that suits your needs. Cancel your current broadband while you are at it – this is as smooth as it gets.
Sign up for home insurance with If and get a 10 % discount for the first full year!
Cancel your current home insurance as well – you will not need it much longer.
Let one of our handpicked and quality-assured moving companies do the heavy lifting.
Your back will thank you – and your things will definitely be in safe hands.
Most people who choose to do the move cleaning themselves regret their decision.
Hire one of our quality-assured cleaning companies instead of being wise in hindsight.
Let one of our handpicked and quality-assured moving companies do the heavy lifting.
Your back will thank you – and your things will definitely be in safe hands.
Banana boxes and paper bags are a bad idea if you want your things to arrive uncracked.
Order our high-quality moving boxes and a moving kit today – start packing tomorrow!
